bibl.title: Imaging of the Late Roman Castrum. [1.] Hypothetical Computer Reconstruction of Nag el-Hagar Fortress in Egypt.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Nag el-Hagar fortress. - Brief history of archaeological survey of the site. - Planning structure and main architectural features of the fortress. - Walls and Towers of Fortress. - The Western gate. - The palace. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais. - L'article est accessible aussi en version russe: < http://www.marhi.ru/AMIT/2011/2kvart11/karelin/abstract.php >.
bibl.seg: Dmitry Karelin, Imaging of the Late Roman Castrum. [1.] Hypothetical Computer Reconstruction of Nag el-Hagar Fortress in Egypt.
Architecture and Modern Information Technologies [Moscow, Institute of Architecture] 15 (2011) 20 pp., 11 figg. n./bl. et coul.

Introduction. - Nag el-Hagar fortress. - Brief history of archaeological survey of the site. - Planning structure and main architectural features of the fortress. - Walls and Towers of Fortress. - The Western gate. - The palace. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais. - L'article est accessible aussi en version russe: < http://www.marhi.ru/AMIT/2011/2kvart11/karelin/abstract.php >.
